page.title: 13A SATURDAY IN NORTH CAVE
page.content: Brriiinng, Brriiinng, "Oh, 8.00,I'd better get up. I wonder what's for breakfast - probably grapefruit or a sandwich as usual. I've just got to get dressed, washed and comb my hair. Phew! All ready. I'd better go and feed the guinea pigs. Oh dear! What's wrong with Patch - it looks to me as if she's not very well. Some of her fur's dropped out. It could just be fleas but it might not be. I'd better arrange to get her to the vet. "Come on you two, I've got to go to the shops," Mum called. Oh well,we'd better take the ponies to the field and then I can finish that doll's dress I was making for Caroline. 9.00 p.m. I hope Mum doesn't notice the time. "Come on, off to bed you lot". Pity, she did notice!
